question_text: Identify the highest and the lowest 'NO2(ug/m3) - 2018' point of the Diffusion tube annual nitrogen dioxide concentrations in Limerick for 2018. What is the orientation of the highest point in relation to the lowest point.
Within the region, all islands are labeled in the format 'Island name (country code)'. Identify the country codes of the islands that have an Annual mean BaP concentration 'ng/m^3' point in 2017

The Ordnance Survey Ireland records each 'Bathing Water Quality Status' with a unique number. Identify the numbers of the points classified as having 'Sufficient' Bathing Water Quality Status within the 'Dublin Area'.
According to Ordnance Survey Ireland in 2019, identify the largest 'Designated WFD Shellfish Areas'. What is the name of the 'Large Towns' located closest to it?

According to Ordnance Survey Ireland, identify the region with a 'High' 2013-2018 WFD Surface Waters Ecological Status on the western half of the country. What is the name of the 'Large Towns' located closest to this region.

According to Ordnance Survey Ireland, each waste point is associated with a code (e.g., W0165) and the company managing it (e.g., Ballynagran Landfill). What is the name of the company that manages the 'Landfills Accepting Municipal Waste' site located closest to 'Breedon Cement Ireland Limited'?

According to Ordnance Survey Ireland, locate the 'Ballymagroarty' point from the 'Remedial Action List of Public Water Supplies (July 2020)'. Which category from the 'Licensed Sites by Sector (September 2020)' is most prevalent in the area containing this point?
The Ordnance Survey Ireland divides the country into counties, each labeled with either a number or a number–letter combination. Identify the county labeled '03' and list all counties that border it.
What is the name of the northernmost 'National Air Monitoring Site' as recorded by Ordnance Survey Ireland?

The Ordnance Survey Ireland divides the country into counties, each labeled with either a number or a number–letter combination. How many 'Decrease' points for Rivers 2013–2018 Phosphate Trends are located within the county labeled '20'?
The EPA lists the Targeting Agricultural Measures categories in the legend. Which measure category is associated with the region closest to the Dumping At Sea Permits > Active 2018 'S0021-01' point?

Identify the 'Drogheda' Smoke and SO₂ Monitoring Station in Ireland. Which 'COUNCIL' contains the monitoring station in Dublin that is located closest to it? Provide the council name exactly as labeled. Include the word 'Council' in the answer.
TEAGASC identifies 11 'Great Soil Groups' in Ireland. What is the dominant 'Great Soil Group' in the Mid Western region of Ireland?

Identify the two aquaculture points closest to the northernmost Purple Hairstreak distribution point. For these two points, list the sea-animals under intensive shellfish famrning (each represented by a single alphabet in the legend), as recorded by the Ireland Seafood Development Agency (BIM). Give the names of the sea-animals.

Identify the westernmost '>40,000 tonnes p.a.' Municipal Landfill point. For the area in which this point is located, which 'Rivers Draining in Excess of 2,000 km^2' feature shares its boundary? Provide the name exactly as labeled.

Identify the easternmost 'C: Requires relaying over a long period (at least 2 months) in clean water prior to sale for human consumption' point as designated by DCMNR (Department of Communications, Marine and Natural Resources in Ireland). Which major 'Estuaries and Bays' is located closest to this point? Give the name exactly as it appears on the map.

Identify the area in which the air quality assessment zone 'Sligo' is located. Within this area, how many bathing areas are classified as 'Compliant with EC Guide and Mandatory Values'? Include the ones if they lie on the border.
